document_metadata.document_type: string - Type of document (invoice, brokerage, dmv, legal, medical, etc.)
document_metadata.document_date: string - Date on the document if available
document_metadata.document_title: string - Title or header of the document
document_metadata.sender_organization: string - Organization that sent/created the document
document_metadata.recipient_name: string - Who the document is addressed to

key_information.dates: array - All important dates found in the document
key_information.reference_numbers: array - Any reference, account, or ID numbers
key_information.names: array - People or organization names mentioned
key_information.addresses: array - Physical or email addresses found

action_items.required_actions: array - Actions that need to be taken

document_summary.main_purpose: string - Brief description of document's purpose
document_summary.key_points: array - Bullet points of most important information

technical_details.total_pages: number - Number of pages in document
